price: 58.Nabii Mucammadowﷺ tama Nabii Qiisä caagidik kol nakriyeeh kol maaqnam Baxxaqqa itta Astootiy ku-Nubuwwannu tascassee kee Qhuraanay diggi ittam Addal как taniy cakkii kee deedal ittak Baxsa Agay-waaga mali usuk Yallih xaquk yanim.
arabic: ذَٰلِكَ نَتۡلُوهُ عَلَيۡكَ مِنَ ٱلۡأٓيَٰتِ وَٱلذِّكۡرِ ٱلۡحَكِيمِ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: dhālika natlūhu ʿalayka mina al-āyāti wal-dhik'ri al-ḥakīmi
